General.Name: ShenZhen GAD Environmental Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: ShenZhen GAD Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. offers solid waste treatment services. The company operates through Pollution Isolation Systems, Ecological Environment Restoration, and Utilization of Renewable Resources segments. It engages in construction of engineering projects; and industrial solid waste disposal. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
